com.stormpath.sdk.ds

Interface DataStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Client

    public interface DataStore
    A DataStore is the liaison between client SDK components and the raw Stormpath REST API. It is responsible for converting SDK objects (Account, Directory, Group instances, etc) into REST HTTP requests, executing those requests, and converting REST HTTP responses back into SDK objects.
    Since:
    0.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiKey getApiKey()
      Returns the ApiKey used to authenticate HTTPS requests sent to the Stormpath API server.
      CacheManager getCacheManager()
      Returns the CacheManager used to improve data store performance.

      <T extends Resource,O extends Options>
      T      		 getResource(String href, Class<T> clazz, O options)
      Retrieves the resource at the specified href according to the specified Options and returns the resource as an instance of the specified clazz.

      Instantiates and returns a new instance of the specified Resource type.

    • Method Detail

      • instantiate

        <T extends Resource> T instantiate(Class<T> clazz)
        Instantiates and returns a new instance of the specified Resource type. The instance is merely instantiated and is not saved/synchronized with the server in any way.

        This method effectively replaces the new keyword that would have been used otherwise if the concrete implementation was known (Resource implementation classes are intentionally not exposed to SDK end-users).

        Type Parameters:
        T - the Resource sub-type
        Parameters:
        clazz - the Resource class to instantiate.
        Returns:
        a new instance of the specified Resource.

      • getResource

        <T extends Resource> T getResource(String href,
                                   Class<T> clazz)
        Looks up (retrieves) the resource at the specified href URL and returns the resource as an instance of the specified class.

        The Class argument must represent an interface that is a sub-interface of Resource, for example Account, Directory, etc.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type parameter indicating the returned value is a Resource instance.
        Parameters:
        href - the resource URL of the resource to retrieve
        clazz - the Resource sub-interface to instantiate
        Returns:
        an instance of the specified class based on the data returned from the specified href URL.

      • getResource

        <T extends Resource,O extends Options> T getResource(String href,
                                                     Class<T> clazz,
                                                     O options)
        Retrieves the resource at the specified href according to the specified Options and returns the resource as an instance of the specified clazz.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type parameter indicating the returned value is a Resource instance.
        Parameters:
        href - the URL of the resource to retrieve
        clazz - the Resource sub-interface to instantiate
        options - the Options sub-interface with the properties to expand
        Returns:
        an instance of the specified class based on the data returned from the specified href URL.
        Since:
        1.0.RC4.6

      • getApiKey

        ApiKey getApiKey()
        Returns the ApiKey used to authenticate HTTPS requests sent to the Stormpath API server.
        Returns:
        the ApiKey used to authenticate HTTPS requests sent to the Stormpath API server.
        Since:
        1.0.RC3

      • getCacheManager

        CacheManager getCacheManager()
        Returns the CacheManager used to improve data store performance.
        Returns:
        the CacheManager used to improve data store performance.
        Since:
        1.0.RC3
